Literature.Title: Small Amphiphilic Peptides: Activity Against a Broad Range of Drug-Resistant Bacteria and Structural Insight into Membranolytic Properties.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Mandal D, Choi W, Konshina AG, Tiwari RK, Efremov RG, Maslennikov I, Parang K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1556(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27883(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 27270(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51575(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=50µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 700677(MIC=25µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 13061(MIC=6.2µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC BAA-2452(MIC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>50µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2470(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC BAA-1605(MIC=25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10145(MIC=50µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC BAA-1744(MIC=25µg/ml)
